Bitcoin Mining

Fifth lecture of the Bitcoin and cryptocurrency technologies online course.

In this lecture:

  • The task of Bitcoin miners
  • Mining hardware
  • Energy consumption & ecology
  • Mining pools
  • Mining incentives and strategies
